text: A tropical cyclone forecast model is a computer program that uses meteorological data to forecast where tropical cyclones will go and how strong they will be. Models use powerful supercomputers and mathematical modeling software. There are two general types: statistical and dynamic. There are two main types of forecasts: track and intensity. ==Other websites== * Tropical Cyclone Forecasters Reference Guide, Chapter 5 * Model Analyses and Forecasts from NCEP Category:Tropical cyclones
title: Tropical cyclone forecast model
